data.title: Coffee Shop with class....
data.text: I met friends for coffee and was surprised they served my tea, because I was staying in a large mug! Much more flavorful in ceramic and a nice effort!

data.title: Great coffee
data.text:
If you came for the coffee and why wouldn't you; you can't go wrong.  Goodbye Starbucks, this is way better!
I will stop at any of their shops next chance I get.

data.title: Digging me some Dazbog's
data.text: Barista's here are awesome! Always friendly regardless the time of day 6am or 9pm! Never once have they burned my coffee either. Favorite coffee shop no doubt.

data.title: Great neighborhood coffee shop
data.text:
EXCELLENT Coffee AND Snacks GREAT staff. Had black coffee and muffin.  Stop by for coffee most Sat
EXCELLENT seats

data.title: Love This Place
data.text: I like the ambiance, the employees and the fact that they have gluten-free bread options. I used to come daily for their decaf Chai, but now I only visit when I am in town!

data.title: Very Nice if you Like Strong Russian Coffee
data.text: Had a coupon for a couple of Lattes at Dazbog so my friend and I stopped by the downtown Loveland location. Nice warm atmosphere and the Barista was very friendly explaining the meaning of Dazbog which roughly translated to "Heaven sent".. (depending on whom you ask of course). The coffee was a bit strong for our tastes, but if you like strong Russian coffee, this would likely be a great place to enjoy it especially on a cold winter day.

data.title: Excellent service, excellent coffee!
data.text: We just ordered a couple of coffees to go - a latte and an americano - and both were prepared to perfection! The staff is quite friendly, too

data.title: A place I always visit.
data.text: This Dazbog location never disappoints. They are welcoming, informative, friendly, always willing to accommodate preferences, and or provide suggestions. The coffee is considerably good and of a quality that you cannot simply get elsewhere. A returning patron almost each and everyday I am in town.

data.title: Enjoy a latte with friends
data.text: I've stopped in at Dazbog many times usually catch up with a girl friend sometimes just to grab a latte to go.  It's very comfortable to spend an hour or so.  I love seeing photography and paintings by many of our local artists.

data.title: Best coffee house in Loveland.
data.text: Caramel Macchiato or Cinnamon Chai Chiller, try either of these if you like a foo-foo drink, I prefer cold blended drinks, that is what both of these are. SOOO good! Such a treat, and great coffee house feel

data.title: Great Coffee & Service
data.text:
We've always wanted to try Dazbog Coffee every time we drive by it and finally stopped in one weekend afternoon. We were really glad we did.

We ordered a cup of medium roasted Hermitage House Blend coffee and a cappuccino to go and were pleasantly surprised at how smooth and delicious the coffee really was.

Service was very good and the ambiance was comfortable and inviting.

Dazbog offers gourmet coffee that is fresh roasted daily and was originally founded by Russian immigrants. They also feature tea, but we did not try this, although we will keep it in mind next visit.

Definitely give Dazbog a try if you are ever nearby one of their shops in northern Colorado.
